cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs on August 4, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3508, an act to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 39 West Main Street, in Honeoye Falls, New York, as the “CW4 Christian J. Koch Memorial Post Office

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 91 (Tuesday, May 25, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H2667-H2668]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JACOBS of New York:
H.R. 3508.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
[[Page H2668]]
Article 1, Section 8, of the United States Constitution
title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 39 West Main Street, in Honeoye Falls, New York, as the "CW4 Christian J. Koch Memorial Post Office".
